post.author: 권상하
post.content:
Hi , Hope you are doing great" We are in immediate need of " C++ Developer ".So if you are available and interested in the position described below please revert back with a word copy of your updated resume and a rate which you will be looking for the position and also please dont forget to put a best number to reach you.
job Title: C++ Developer location: San Jose, CA Length: 4-6 months to hire
Embedded Linux C/C++ Middleware Developer Embedded Linux, C/C++, Media Streaming, GUI, Consumer Electronics, DirectFB, OpenGL, MPEG, H.264, UPNP, DLNA, HTML, HTTP, XML, Social Networking, Set-top Box
Our client has a contract to hire opening for an Embedded Linux C/C++ Developer with the following skill set: Required Skills: 5+ yrs of work experience Embedded Linux C/C++ DirectFB or OpenGL (must have Graphics Library experience) Digital media streaming GUI Consumer electronics devices
Thanks & Regards, Ramesh Kumar CAT Technology Inc. "Committed to Human Excellence Through IT" 377, Route 17 South Suite # 208 Hasbrouck Heights, NJ 07604 Voice: 201-255-0319 x 172 Fax: 201-727-9296 Email: Kumar@catstaffing-us.com Visit us at: www.catamerica.com www.cattechnologies.com
post.title: c++ USA
